mapper.select: SELECT id, name, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl, price, stock, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM products

select id, name, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl, price, stock, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from ( select row_number()over(order by updated_at desc) as rnum, id, name, thumbnail_url, price, stock, created_at, updated_at from products where status = 1 order by updated_at desc) a where rnum between #{start} and #{start} + 11 order by updated_at desc;
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_id, product_id, quantity) values(#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
